meaningMnemonic: You’re so hungry that you <radical>eat</radical> a <radical>table</radical> so you won’t <kanji>starve</kanji>. If you don’t eat this table, you will most definitely starve, so you eat the table to stay alive.
readingMnemonic: After you finish the table, you still feel like you might <kanji>starve</kanji> so you decide to eat every <reading>key</reading> (き) off your key ring. One by one, you eat each and every key so you don’t starve.
